title: Settings
body: Guys i am trying for** 4 hours **to change the settings to "Attack/move click" to mb1 through the "**Input.ini**" and "**PeristedSettings**" but everytime when i join a custom game to see if it works, it's just like i didn't change anything for some reason i don't know. How can i make it so they can actually work?

replies.body: I would suggest getting a gaming style mouse. Map the attack move key to one of the additional buttons.

Swapping the left and right mouse buttons is not currently a feature, and file modification is not something we support.   It's not likely that we could assist with this, but reach out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if we can find any options for you.  Thanks for your patience!
It isn't something bannable to do something like that right?
Not currently, but changing around game files to do things that aren't intended makes it difficult to provide support when something goes wrong.
Yeah ok i see but thank you anyway
